definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Polarimetric observations of Nova Cygni 1975 are presented.
sentences.chinese: 對1975年天鵝座新星進行了偏振測光。

sentences.english: Look northeast of bright star Deneb in the constellation Cygnus the Swan.
sentences.chinese: 它們在天鵝座的天津四這顆亮星的東北方。

sentences.english: It looks for planets in the constellations Cygnus and Lyra.
sentences.chinese: 尋找天鵝座及天琴座的行星。

sentences.english: To find it, look northeast of bright star Deneb in the high flying constellation Cygnus.
sentences.chinese: 在天鵝座內明亮的天津四東北方向上就能找到它。
